turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How may i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to place an order for pickup for the Starbucks at 15 South Prospect Avenue in Parkridge, Illinois, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink are you trying to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a tall iced cold foam cappuccino, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get soy milk, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and finally, any sweetners or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a teaspoon of honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let's check that your order is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want a tall iced foam cappucino with soy milk and a teaspoon of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is this right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Affirmative.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order this now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the order has been sent to 15 south prospect avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you kindly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready momentarily.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.
